definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: hill—abs. [[גִּבְעָה]] 2Sa 2:25 + 13 t. + Ez Eze 6:13 (del. Co q.v.) 1Sa 7:1, 2Sa 6:3, 2Sa 6:4 (cf. Dr); cstr. [[גִּבְעַת]] Jos 5:3 + 8 t. + 1Sa 10:5 (cf. Dr); sf. [[גִּבְעָתִי]] Ez Eze 34:26 (but del. Co), [[גִּבְעָתָהּ]] Is 31:4; pl. abs. [[גְּבָעוֹת]] De 12:2 + 35 t.; cstr. [[גִּבְעוֹת]] De 33:15, Hb Hab 3:6, [[גִּבְעׂת]] Ge 49:26; sf. [[גִּבְעוֹתֶיךָ]] Ez. Eze 35:8; —hill, height, elevation, both high and low, cf. Ps 148:9 [[ההרים וכל גבעות]], Ps 65:13; —
in ordinary prose, hill, lower than mountain Ex 17:9, Ex 17:10 (E) 2Sa 2:25; it may be n.pr. in 1Sa 7:1, 1Sa 10:10, 2Sa 6:3, 2Sa 6:4 v. also sub II. [[גִּבְעָה]].

esp. as place of illicit worship [[גְּבׂהָה ותחת כל עץ רענן]] ´[[עַל כָּל־ג]] 1Ki 14:23, 2Ki 17:10, Je 2:20; cf. De 12:2, 2Ki 16:4, 2Ch 28:4 (these two + [[במות]]); also Ho 4:13, Je 13:27, Je 17:2, Ez Eze 6:13 (v. supr.).

very commonly ‖[[הר]] in poet. & proph. De 33:15, Ps 72:3, Ps 114:4, Ps 114:6, Ps 148:9, Ct So 2:8, So 4:6, Is 2:2, Is 2:14, Is 30:17, Is 30:25, Is 31:4, Is 40:4, Is 40:12, Is 41:15, Is 42:15, Is 54:10, Is 55:12, Is 65:7, Je 3:23, Je 4:24, Je 16:16, Je 50:7, Ez Eze 6:3, Eze 34:6, Eze 35:8, Eze 36:4, Eze 36:6, Ho 4:13, Ho 10:8, Jos 4:18, Am 9:13, Mic 4:1, Mic 6:1, Na 1:5, Hb Hab 3:6; rarely in prose De 12:2; sometimes as high and majestic (poet.) [[עולם]] ´[[ג]] Ge 49:26, De 33:15, Hb Hab 3:6 (‘everlasting hills’); cf. also Job 15:7, Pr 8:25(with adj. high, cf. supr.); v. also Je 49:16.

hills with special names, some nearly or quite = n.pr.loc., which see under the respective words: [[מׂרֶה]] ´[[ג]] Ju Jdg 7:1 teacher's hill, in valley of Jezreel; [[הָעֲרָלוֹת]] ´[[ג]] Jos 5:3 hill of the fore-skins; [[הָאֱלֽהִים]] ´[[ג]] 1Sa 10:5 (a designation of Gibeah); [[הַחֲכִילָה]] ´[[ג]] 1Sa 23:19, 1Sa 26:1, 1Sa 26:3; [[אַמָּה]] ´[[ג]] 2Sa 2:24; [[הַלְּבוֹנׇה]] ´[[ג]] Ct So 4:6 (i.e. hill where frankincense is grown); [[גׇּרֵבָ]] ´[[ג]] Je 31:39; [[יְרוּשָׁלַם]] ´[[ג]] Is 10:32 cf. Is 31:4 (where ‖[[הַר־חִיּוֹן]]), Ez Eze 34:26 (v. supr.) & [[הַגְּבָעוֹת]] Zep 1:10 hills on which Jerusalem stands.
